stories.text: Hi team, I just launched a website that allows users to book 30 minute Zoom calls with mentors for business advice. I'm looking for mentors to join the service. If you are a business professional with years of experience, feel free to go to https://www.mentordial.com/become-a-mentor to register as a mentor. Thanks!
stories.title: Looking for Business Mentors

stories.text:
I have two machines at home on Windows 10: a gaming desktop on Windows 10 Pro and a laptop on Windows 10 home. Should I accept the offered windows 11 upgrade?

It sounds like there is no going back after a 10 day grace period.

What are the pros and cons? Are there any use cases where either the pros or cons are big?
stories.title: Should I accept the free Windows 11 upgrade?
